title: Lets talk about Adolescence

author: Russell Brand
description:
Go to http://www.RuffGreens.com and use promo code Russell to fetch a FREE Jumpstart Trial Bag for your Dog today!

Go to http://rumble.com/premium/brand and use code BRAND to save $10 on your annual subscription

⏰ BE HERE AT 1PM EST / 6PM BST⏰

Join us here for a PREVIEW of our daily one-hour RUMBLE show. 
To continue watching the show in full, join me exclusively over on RUMBLE: https://bit.ly/SF561-live

I’m now facing serious allegations in the UK and a civil case in the US—allegations I completely deny. While I can’t speak directly to the legal proceedings, what I *can* talk about is the broader context: a justice system that’s looking increasingly politicized. In the UK, we’re seeing people arrested over speech, journalists raising alarms, and the law being used in ways that feel less about justice and more about control. When this becomes the climate, we have to ask: is the system protecting the public—or protecting power?
title: I’m Facing Prison — Here’s the Truth About What’s Going on in the UK – SF561
